featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Commercial Office Space Investment Options in Sector 106 Gurugram
description: Choosing the right office space for sale in Sector 106 depends entirely on your business scale and investment horizon. features.title: Compact Managed Office Suites

This synergy is particularly valuable for businesses like financial services or consulting firms that require high street accessibility and high foot traffic presence near the Dwarka Expressway infrastructure.

features.description: An attractive option for passive investors. You purchase the unit and the management company handles leasing maintenance and operations providing guaranteed monthly returns without the burdens of tenancy management. faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Office Space For Sale in Sector 106 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get expert answers to all your queries regarding commercial property investment and future growth prospects in Sector 106 Dwarka Expressway

faqs.question: What makes Sector 106 a prime location for office space investment now
faqs.answer: Sector 106 is considered prime because it is centrally located on the pivotal Dwarka Expressway a corridor witnessing rapid infrastructure completion. This ensures superior connectivity to Gurgaon IGI Airport and established Gurugram business districts. Investing now allows buyers to capitalize on pre-completion property rates before the expected substantial price hike driven by fully operational connectivity and increased corporate migration to the area.

faqs.question: Are the office spaces in Sector 106 RERA approved
faqs.answer: Yes we primarily deal in office space for sale in Sector 106 projects that are fully compliant with the Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA guidelines. RERA registration ensures project transparency adherence to timelines and builder accountability. We verify all legal documents and approvals to guarantee a secure and risk-free commercial property purchase for our clients.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes available for office space for sale in this sector
faqs.answer: The available inventory is diverse catering to various scales of business. Common sizes range from smaller managed office suites of 400 square feet suitable for startups and professionals to large corporate floor plates exceeding 10000 square feet. We offer shell and core options for bespoke fit-outs and ready-to-move-in furnished units providing maximum flexibility for investors and end-users.

faqs.question: What is the expected rental yield for commercial property in Sector 106
faqs.answer: Current projections indicate a strong potential for rental yields typically falling between 6 percent and 8 percent depending on the building class location and size of the unit. As infrastructure matures and corporate tenancy increases these yields are expected to stabilize or even increase making office space for sale in Sector 106 a robust income-generating asset compared to residential properties.

faqs.question: How does Dwarka Expressway benefit my office space investment
faqs.answer: The Dwarka Expressway is crucial as it dramatically improves connectivity between Gurugram and major transport hubs like IGI Airport and Dwarka Gurgaon. This enhanced access attracts premium tenants who prioritize ease of commute for their employees and clients. Better infrastructure directly translates to higher property valuations and better tenant profiles for the commercial spaces along the corridor.

faqs.question: Is there adequate parking facility for commercial complexes in Sector 106
faqs.answer: All Grade A commercial complexes featuring office space for sale in Sector 106 are designed with multi-level basement parking and dedicated surface parking ensuring ample capacity for employees clients and visitors. Adequate parking is a standard requirement for premium commercial tenants and is ensured in all our recommended listings.

faqs.question: Should I invest in shell and core or a ready-to-move office unit
faqs.answer: Shell and core units offer maximum customization allowing you to design the space precisely to your operational needs which is ideal for established businesses. Ready-to-move units are preferable for investors seeking immediate rental income or for businesses needing fast deployment minimizing fit-out time and cost. The choice depends entirely on your immediate capital deployment strategy.

faqs.question: What are the hidden costs associated with purchasing commercial office space
faqs.answer: Beyond the basic sale price you must budget for registration charges stamp duty Goods and Services Tax GST applicable on new construction maintenance security deposit charges and the cost of interior fit-outs if purchasing a shell and core unit. Our team provides a detailed financial breakdown of all these costs during the consultation phase.

faqs.question: What kind of businesses are likely to establish offices in Sector 106
faqs.answer: Sector 106 is attracting a diverse mix of businesses including IT and ITES companies financial services firms consulting agencies corporate headquarters and specialized service providers due to its strategic location and modern infrastructure. Its proximity to both Gurgaon and Gurugram makes it ideal for regional offices.

faqs.question: Can NRIs easily purchase office space for sale in Sector 106 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes NRIs can purchase commercial property in Sector 106 with relative ease. We offer specialized NRI services including virtual site tours legal advisory on FEMA compliance and transparent transaction handling. The stable appreciation potential and high rental yields make this sector particularly attractive for international investors seeking high-growth Indian assets.
